00001 #include "AsyncEventHandler.hh"
00002 #include "BaseModule.hh"
00003 #include "EventHandler.hh"
00004 
00005 #ifndef SINGLETHREAD
00006 #include "boost/thread.hpp"
00007 #include "boost/thread/mutex.hpp"
00008 #endif
00009 
00010 AsyncEventHandler::AsyncEventHandler() : _running(false), _sleeptime(0), 
00011                                          _blocking(false)
00012 {}
00013 
00014 AsyncEventHandler::~AsyncEventHandler()
00015 {
00016   if(_running){
00017     //this really shouldn't happen, but make sure we end properly...
00018     StopRunning();
00019   }
00020 }
00021 
00022 void AsyncEventHandler::Reset()
00023 {
00024   _modules.clear();
00025   _receivers.clear();
00026 }
00027 
00028 int AsyncEventHandler::AddModule(BaseModule* mod,
00029                                  bool register_to_eventhandler)
00030 {
00031   if(mod){
00032     _modules.push_back(mod);
00033     if(register_to_eventhandler) {
00034       EventHandler::GetInstance()->AddModule(mod, false);
00035     }
00036   }
00037   return 0;
00038 }
00039 
00040 int AsyncEventHandler::AddReceiver(AsyncEventHandler* receiver)
00041 {
00042   if(receiver)
00043     _receivers.push_back(receiver);
00044   return _receivers.size();
00045 }
00046 
00047 int AsyncEventHandler::Process(EventPtr evt)
00048 {
00049   //noop if no multithread
00050 #ifdef SINGLETHREAD
00051   Message(WARNING)<<"Attempt to use AsyncEventHandler with multithreading disabled!\n";
00052 #else
00053   if(_running){
00054     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(_event_mutex);
00055     while(_blocking && _next_event){
00056       //only go if _next_event is not filled
00057       lock.unlock();
00058       boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::millisec(1));
00059       lock.lock();
00060     }
00061     _next_event = evt; 
00062     _event_ready.notify_one();
00063   }
00064 #endif
00065   return 0;
00066 }
00067 
00068 int AsyncEventHandler::StartRunning()
00069 {
00070 #ifndef SINGLETHREAD
00071   //if we have no enabled modules, don't run
00072   int enabled_modules = 0;
00073   for(size_t i=0; i<_modules.size(); ++i){
00074     if(_modules[i]->enabled)
00075       ++enabled_modules;
00076   }
00077   if(enabled_modules == 0){
00078     Message(DEBUG)<<"AsyncEventHandler not running: no enabled modules.\n";
00079     return 1;
00080   }
00081   //start a thread
00082   _running = true;
00083   typedef boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> _tp;
00084   _threadptr = _tp(new boost::thread(boost::ref(*this)));
00085   Message(DEBUG)<<"AsyncEventHandler running on thread "<<_threadptr->get_id()
00086                 <<" with sleeptime "<<_sleeptime<<" ms "
00087                 <<" contains "<<_modules.size()<<" modules.\n";
00088   return 0;
00089 #else
00090   Message(WARNING)<<"Attempt to use AsyncEventHandler with multithreading disabled!\n";
00091   return 1; //only here if singlethread mode compiled
00092 #endif
00093 }
00094 
00095 int AsyncEventHandler::StopRunning()
00096 {
00097   if(!_running)
00098     return 1;
00099   _running = false;
00100 #ifndef SINGLETHREAD
00101   //wake up the thread if it's sleeping
00102   Message(DEBUG)<<"Ending AsyncEventHandler on thread "<<_threadptr->get_id()
00103                 <<"...\n";
00104   Process(EventPtr());
00105   _threadptr->join();
00106 #endif
00107   return 0;
00108   
00109 }
00110 
00111 void AsyncEventHandler::operator()()
00112 {
00113 #ifndef SINGLETHREAD
00114   //need a dummy mutex for condition_variable to work
00115   boost::mutex dummy_mutex;
00116   EventPtr current_event;
00117   while(_running){
00118     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(_event_mutex);
00119     if(!_next_event || _next_event == current_event){
00120       _event_ready.timed_wait(lock,boost::posix_time::millisec(1000));
00121       continue;
00122     }
00123     //if we get here, process the event
00124     current_event = _next_event;
00125     if(!_blocking)
00126       lock.unlock();
00127     for(size_t i=0; i<_modules.size(); ++i){
00128       if(_modules[i]->enabled){
00129         _modules[i]->HandleEvent(current_event);
00130         //boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::microsec(2) );
00131       }
00132     }
00133     //done processing, hand off to receivers
00134     for(size_t i=0; i<_receivers.size(); ++i){
00135       _receivers[i]->Process(current_event);
00136     }
00137     if(!_blocking){
00138       if(_sleeptime>0){
00139         boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::millisec(_sleeptime));
00140       }
00141       else
00142         boost::this_thread::yield();
00143     }
00144     else{
00145       _next_event = EventPtr();
00146     }
00147   }
00148 #endif
00149 }
